nodes.asset_description: Four-photo collage with a large white diamond shape at center formed by thick white diagonal bands. Top-left quadrant: soft pink background with white cosmetic containers (two squeeze tubes, a small jar, and a clear glass dropper bottle). Top-right quadrant: split yellow and orange background with two dark amber glass dropper bottles with white droppers and metallic gold collars casting shadows. Bottom-left quadrant: tan and cream angled papers with a white pump bottle, a white bath bomb, and a lip balm stick. Bottom-right quadrant: gray surface above white marble surface with a beige bowl holding two small clear bottles of amber/pink liquid wrapped in a white textured cloth.
